CustomField.description: The unit of time the Project Task's length must fit into. For example if the unit is 4 a task must be 4, 8 12 hours etc. The same rule applies to Time Entry objects. This is a system field and should never be modified. (Cloud Coach 21-JUL-11)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a system field and should never be modified.
CustomField.label: Hours Block
